Overwhelming support $$$  across the Globe, poured in for the Father    <3

Footage of Randall Margrave‚Äôs attack on USA Gymnastics doctor Larry Nassar on Friday quickly went viral across the world. Aaron Pangborn set up the ‚ÄòShow support for Randall Margraves‚Äô Go Fund Me page hours after the incident in court. The aim of the page was ‚Äòto help a brother and friend in need‚Äô and raise $1,000. However, hundreds of people began donating small amounts of cash and now the total has hit $ 30,000 Cory Mara wrote on the page:  ‚ÄòFrom one Union Family Man to Another. Proud of you Brother, too bad you didn‚Äôt get a few licks in.‚Äô Robert Wykoski added: ‚ÄòAs the father of two  girls, the video made me cry, that you were stopped before you reached him. I would do the same. God Bless you and your family.‚Äô Margraves had asked Judge Janice Cunningham to give him ‚Äòa minute alone‚Äô with the abuser of his children. When she refused, he rushed at the doctor before he was taken down by security.
